## multiplyAlpha() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Multiplies the alpha component to the other three components.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function multiplyAlpha({ red, green, blue, alpha }: RGBA): RGBA;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { red, green, blue, alpha } | [RGBA](./mapbox-geo-circle-layer.rgba.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[RGBA](./mapbox-geo-circle-layer.rgba.md)

New RGBA object that has the alpha multiplied to the other components of `color`<!-- -->.
